name: spermatophyte
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any plant from a large group of plants that produce seeds. They include angiosperms (= plants that produce flowers and seeds) and gymnosperms (= plants that produce seeds but no flowers): The spermatophytes, which means "seed plants", are some of the most important organisms on Earth. The most successful and advanced group of land plants are the spermatophytes. Compare
angiosperm
gymnosperm
More examplesFewer examplesGermination is the process that leads to the sprouting of a seedling from a seed of a spermatophyte.Spermatophytes were most diverse during the Carboniferous Period due to the change in climate.The great adaptive potential of physiological dormancy is associated with high diversification of spermatophytes.
